body:

# PR Summary

In module loading scenario PerfView shows a lot of allocations of StringBuilder objects
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22290914/60356554-b9327700-99ea-11e9-81b9-ec065c19872c.png)

The fix is to use System.IO.Path.Join() method.
